attributes.action: Ask the American Government if the British people can vote in the next US elections.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The reason for this is that whoever gets in to the White House, effectively leads us too. It is only fair that we get a say and it will help America put into practice what it preaches about democracy.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
